feed.title: Track Awesome Langchain Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: üòé Awesome list of tools and projects with the awesome LangChain framework

entry.title: Awesome Langchain Updates on May 12 - May 18, 2025
entry.content:
Ports to other languages

  • Langchain-hs (‚≠ê28): Haskell implementation of Haskell.
  • Langchain (‚≠ê928): Elixir implementation of a LangChain
  • Langchain-rust (‚≠ê999): LangChain for Rust

Tools / Services

  • UQLM (‚≠ê776): UQLM: Uncertainty Quantification for Language Models, is a Python library for LLM hallucination detection using state-of-the-art uncertainty quantification techniques

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • TensorZero (‚≠ê8.5k): An open-source framework for building production-grade LLM applications. It unifies an LLM gateway, observability, optimization, evaluations, and experimentation.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on May 12 - May 18, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Langchain Updates on Apr 28 - May 04, 2025
entry.content:
Tools / Services

  • LangWatch (‚≠ê2.2k): An Open Source tool for observing, evaluating and optimising your llm apps and prompts, which supports LangChain out of the box!
  • Agentic Radar (‚≠ê623) - Open-source CLI security scanner for agentic workflows. Scans your workflow‚Äôs source code, detects vulnerabilities, and generates an interactive visualization along with a detailed security report.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Apr 28 - May 04, 2025

entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Langchain Updates on Apr 15 - Apr 21, 2024
entry.content:
Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • Maestro (‚≠ê4.3k): A framework for Claude Opus to intelligently orchestrate subagents.
  • GPT Pilot (‚≠ê33k): GPT Pilot is the core technology for the Pythagora VS Code extension that aims to provide the first real AI developer companion.
  • SWE Agent (‚≠ê17k): SWE-agent takes a GitHub issue and tries to automatically fix it, using GPT-4, or your LM of choice.
  • Gateway (‚≠ê8.9k): A Blazing Fast AI Gateway. Route to 100+ LLMs with 1 fast & friendly API.
  • AgentRun (‚≠ê325): The easiest, and fastest way to run AI-generated Python code safely
  • LLama Cpp Agent (‚≠ê575): The llama-cpp-agent framework is a tool designed for easy interaction with Large Language Models
  • FinRobot (‚≠ê3.7k): An Open-Source AI Agent Platform for Financial Applications using LLMs
  • Groq Ruby (‚≠ê117): Groq Cloud runs LLM models fast and cheap. This is a convenience client library for Ruby.
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Apr 15 - Apr 21, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Langchain Updates on Apr 01 - Apr 07, 2024
entry.content:
Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • LLocalSearch (‚≠ê5.9k): LLocalSearch is a completely locally running search aggregator using LLM Agents. The user can ask a question and the system will use a chain of LLMs to find the answer. The user can see the progress of the agents and the final answer. No OpenAI or Google API keys are needed.
  • Plandex (‚≠ê14k): An AI coding engine for complex tasks

entry.content:

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • Fructose (‚≠ê744): Fructose is a python package to create a dependable, strongly-typed interface around an LLM call.
  • R2R (‚≠ê7k): A framework for rapid development and deployment of production-ready RAG systems

entry.content:

  • Chidori (‚≠ê1.3k): A reactive runtime for building durable AI agents

entry.title: Awesome Langchain Updates on Jun 26 - Jul 02, 2023
entry.content:
Tools / Agents

  • Multi-Modal LangChain agents in Production (‚≠ê459): Deploy LangChain Agents and connect them to Telegram
  • DemoGPT (‚≠ê1.8k): DemoGPT enables you to create quick demos by just using prompt. It applies ToT approach on Langchain documentation tree.

Tools / Templates

  • AI Getting Started (‚≠ê4.1k): A Javascript AI getting started stack for weekend projects, including image/text models, vector stores, auth, and deployment configs
  • Embedchain (‚≠ê37k): Framework to easily create LLM powered bots over any dataset.

Open Source Projects / Knowledge Management

  • DocNavigator (‚≠ê124): AI-powered chatbot builder that is designed to improve the user experience on product documentation/support websites
  • ChatFiles (‚≠ê3.3k): Upload your document and then chat with it. Powered by GPT / Embedding / TS / NextJS.

Open Source Projects / Other / Chatbots

  • Robby-Chatbot (‚≠ê812): AI chatbot ü§ñ for chat with CSV, PDF, TXT files üìÑ and YTB videos üé• | using Langchainü¶ú | OpenAI | Streamlit ‚ö°.

  • Instrukt (‚≠ê314): A fully-fledged AI environment in the terminal. Build, test and instruct agents.

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • Langchain Tutorials (‚≠ê7.1k): overview and tutorial of the LangChain Library
  • LangChain Chinese Getting Started Guide (‚≠ê8.3k): Chinese LangChain Tutorial for Beginners
  • Flan5 LLM: PDF QA using LangChain for chain of thought and multi-task instructions, Flan5 on HuggingFace
  • LangChain Handbook (‚≠ê2.9k): Pinecone / James Briggs' LangChain handbook
  • Query the YouTube video transcripts: Query the YouTube video transcripts, returning timestamps as sources to legitimize the answers
  • llm-lobbyist (‚≠ê171): Large Language Models as Corporate Lobbyists
  • Langchain Semantic Search (‚≠ê44): Search and indexing your own Google Drive Files using GPT3, LangChain, and Python
  • GPT Political Compass
  • llm-grovers-search-party (‚≠ê11): Leveraging Qiskit, OpenAI and LangChain to demonstrate Grover's algorithm
  • TextWorld ReAct Agent
  • LangChain <> Wolfram Alpha
  • BYO Knowledge Graph (‚≠ê202)

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • Botpress (‚≠ê14k): The building blocks for building chatbots
  • Haystack (‚≠ê21k): NLP framework to interact with your data using Transformer models and LLMs
entry.summary: 25 awesome projects updated on May 15 - May 21, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Langchain Updates on May 08 - May 14, 2023
entry.content:
Tools / Agents

  • AgentGPT (‚≠ê35k): AI Agents with Langchain & OpenAI (Vercel / Nextjs)
  • RasaGPT (‚≠ê2.4k): RasaGPT is the first headless LLM chatbot platform built on top of Rasa and Langchain.
  • BabyAGI UI (‚≠ê1.3k): Make it easier to run and develop with babyagi in a web app, like a ChatGPT

Open Source Projects / Other / Chatbots

  • Langchain Chat (‚≠ê1k): another Next.js frontend for LangChain Chat.
  • MM ReAct (‚≠ê953): Multi Modal ReAct Design
  • Langchain Chat Websocket (‚≠ê96): About LangChain LLM chat with streaming response over websockets
  • langchain_yt_tools (‚≠ê71): Langchain tools to search/extract/transcribe text transcripts of Youtube videos
  • SmartPilot (‚≠ê46): A Python program leveraging OpenAI's language models to generate, analyze, and select the best answer to a given question

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • Transformers Agents: Provides a natural language API on top of transformers
  • LLM Agents (‚≠ê996): Build agents which are controlled by LLMs
  • OpenLM (‚≠ê372): a drop-in OpenAI-compatible library that can call LLMs from any other hosted inference API. Also Typescript (‚≠ê210)

Complement to this list / Videos Playlists

  • Open LLMs (‚≠ê12k): A list of open LLMs available for commercial use

entry.title: Awesome Langchain Updates on Apr 24 - Apr 30, 2023
entry.content:
LangChain Framework

  • LangChain.js (‚≠ê15k): the js brother ‚ú®

Tools / Low-code

  • Langflow (‚≠ê84k): LangFlow is a UI for LangChain

Tools / Services

  • LlamaHub (‚≠ê3.5k): a library of data loaders for LLMs made by the community
  • Auto-evaluator (‚≠ê1.1k): a lightweight evaluation tool for question-answering using Langchain
  • Langchain visualizer (‚≠ê734): visualization and debugging tool for LangChain workflows
  • LLM Strategy (‚≠ê399): implementing the Strategy Pattern using LLMs
  • datasetGPT (‚≠ê301): A command-line interface to generate textual and conversational datasets with LLMs.

Tools / Agents

  • ThinkGPT (‚≠ê1.6k): Agent techniques to augment your LLM and push it beyond its limits
  • Camel-AutoGPT (‚≠ê1.2k): role-playing approach for LLMs and auto-agents like BabyAGI & AutoGPT
  • PyCodeAGI (‚≠ê185): A small AGI experiment to generate a Python app given what app the user wants to build

Tools / Templates

  • create-t3-turbo-ai (‚≠ê349): t3 based, Langchain-friendly boilerplate for building type-safe, full-stack, LLM-powered web apps with Nextjs and Prisma
  • LangChain.js LLM Template (‚≠ê325): LangChain LLM template that allows you to train your own custom AI LLM model.
  • Streamlit Template (‚≠ê286): template for how to deploy a LangChain on Streamlit
  • Codespaces Template (‚≠ê112): a Codespaces template for getting up-and-running with LangChain in seconds!
  • Gradio Template (‚≠ê135): template for how to deploy a LangChain on Gradio

Open Source Projects / Other / Chatbots

  • Paper QA: LLM Chain for answering questions from documents with citations
  • Chat Langchain (‚≠ê6k): locally hosted chatbot specifically focused on question answering over the LangChain documentation
  • Book GPT (‚≠ê434): drop a book, start asking question.
  • Doc Search (‚≠ê600): converse with book - Built with GPT-3
  • Fact Checker (‚≠ê301): fact-checking LLM outputs with langchain
  • QABot (‚≠ê244): Query local or remote files or databases with natural language queries powered by langchain and openai
  • FlowGPT (‚≠ê296): Generate diagram with AI
  • langchain-text-summarizer: A sample streamlit application summarizing text using LangChain

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • LlamaIndex (‚≠ê43k): provides a central interface to connect your LLM's with external data.
  • Semantic Kernel (‚≠ê25k): Microsoft C# SDK to integrate cutting-edge LLM technology quickly and easily into your apps
  • Promptify (‚≠ê4k): Prompt Engineering | Use GPT or other prompt based models to get structured output.
  • PromptSource (‚≠ê2.9k): About Toolkit for creating, sharing and using natural language prompts.
  • Agent-LLM (‚≠ê3k): An Artificial Intelligence Automation Platform.
  • MiniChain (‚≠ê1.2k): A tiny library for coding with large language models.
  • Griptape (‚≠ê2.3k): Python framework for AI workflows and pipelines with chain of thought reasoning, external tools, and memory.

Complement to this list / Videos Playlists

  • Awesome LLM (‚≠ê24k): Awesome-LLM: a curated list of Large Language Model resources.
  • LLaMA Cult and More (‚≠ê445): Keeping Track of Affordable LLMs, ü¶ô Cult and More
entry.summary: 32 awesome projects updated on Apr 24 - Apr 30, 2023
